titles.title: To direct the Comptroller General of the United States to draft a report identifying reasons for the low number of Hispanic officers and members of the Armed Forces in leadership positions, and recommendations to increase such numbers.
Hispanic Military Officers Act
Hispanic Military Officers Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Hispanic Military Officers Act
This bill requires the Government Accountability Office to report on the reasons for the low number of Hispanic officers and members of the Armed Forces in leadership positions and recommendations to increase those numbers.
